title: People's Court: The Case of the Couch
description: Dave is bringing Susan to court this week because she bought a new couch for the house and Dave hates it.  Dave claims he never wanted a new couch in the first place but Susan is saying he gave his opinion on which one he liked.  Do they get rid of the couch or keep it?
itunes:summary: Dave is bringing Susan to court this week because she bought a new couch for the house and Dave hates it.  Dave claims he never wanted a new couch in the first place but Susan is saying he gave his opinion on which one he liked.  Do they get rid of the couch or keep it?
